data.title: Analysis of 16,922 Patients with Acute Ischemic Stroke and Transient Ischemic Attack in Japan
data.meta_description: Abstract. Objective: The purpose of the present study was to clarify the present status of stroke medicine in Japan using a hospital-based, prospective
data.text:
